content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great place to live. How much were you thinking of paying for rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm very interested in your apartment. It's in a great location, close to all the amenities I need. I'm a student, so I'm looking for a place that's both affordable and comfortable. I'd like to propose a price of 600 Euros per month. What do you think?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Farhad, 600 Euros is a very reasonable offer, especially considering the prime location of the apartment. However, as a landlord, I always aim to get the best deal for my property. Would you be willing to pay a little bit more? Perhaps 650 Euros per month? This would be a fair reflection of the value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 650 Euros is quite fair, considering the location and the quality of the apartment. As a student, I'm on a budget, but I'm willing to stretch a bit for such a great place. I'll agree to the price of 650 Euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
